name: Spelldagger Demo
description:
A short demo for Spelldagger, a stealth game currently in development with a planned release of next fall.

The final game will be based around planning and executing a small number of complex heists in a fantasy city. Gather information, exploit weaknesses, and steal the magical artifact keeping the evil Dead King "alive".

Your primary tools in this endeavor are a pair of daggers that can be enchanted with runes found throughout the city. They can then be left in strategic locations and activated from afar to provide reconnaissance, distract enemies, allow for a quick getaway, and more.

As Spelldagger is currently in active development, feedback and constructive criticism is welcome.
